title: WTB: N172 Boston, Minn., NY, other teams or Portrait
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Boston, Minn., NY, other teams or Portrait
posts.post_content:
I would like to purchase a copy of Old Judge: Barkley 19-1, Brown 45-2, 5, Burdock 53-1, Collins 84-1, Davis 119-5, Dugdale 136-3, Ewing 148-1, Foster 168-5, Gardner 180-6, Healy 218-4, Hogan 229-2, Madden 288-7, Mays 299-5, Morrill 329-1, Nash 340-2, Quinn 375-2, Quinn 376-2,5, Reilly 382-4, Tomney 459-1, Wise 506-4 or any Minneapolis, Milwaukee, New York or Boston player in a batting or leaning on bat pose (with city name visible on chest) or any catcher in full gear. Graded SGC or raw only please (no creases/no pinks/back damage or skinned/re-backed ok). Let me know what you have. Scans can be sent to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks!
Jevne is a tough card, the last one that sold on ebay was a PSA 2 and was bought by Keith Olbermann - I believe it sold for around $700

Uh, ok. I guess that shows how much I know about Old Judges! I asked a question on the forum side about pricing and got no responses. Is it just him or all the Minn. Millers cards? See new cards listed above.

Tony, I have the following Nash card that I could do for $215 shipped.

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&rd=1&item=130407348310&ssPageName=STRK:MESE:IT[/url]

Let me know what you think
-Rhett
[url]rhettyeakley@netzero.com[/url]
